alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 17 at 1:40PM EDT until July 18 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:46 PM EDT Monday the stage was 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain nearly steady around 11.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Mon 12 pm: 11.0 Forecast: Mon 2 pm 11.2 Mon 8 pm 11.2 Tue 2 am 11.2 Tue 8 am 10.9 Tue 2 pm 10.9 Tue 8 pm 10.9 Wed 2 am 10.8 Wed 8 am 10.8 Wed 2 pm 9.5 Wed 8 pm 9.0 Thu 2 am 8.8 Thu 8 am 8.6 &&
